meta.subtitle: The Standard for Human-Made
meta.description: We verify, certify, and anchor your art to the blockchain to prove it is human-made. Secure your art's legacy forever.

home.getStartedP1: Humartz certifies your art as truly human-made in an era of AI-generated content.
home.getStartedP2: We provide a proof-of-creation system to get your work certified, protecting your intellectual property.

showcase.whitepaperTeaser: The Humartz protocol establishes a decentralized proof-of-humanity verification layer using zero-knowledge proofs for media authenticity...

features.title: Authenticity in the Age of AI
features.description: A robust verification protocol combining expert human review with immutable blockchain technology.

items.title: Expert Human Review
items.description: AI detectors aren't enough. Our experts manually review your project files to ensure authentic human creation.

items.title: Cryptographic Proof
items.description: Your certificate is hashed and anchored to the Arbitrum blockchain, creating an unalterable timestamp.

items.title: IP Protection
items.description: We never publish your files. Only the cryptographic hash is public, keeping your creative work private and secure.

items.title: Public Verification URL
items.description: Receive a unique blockchain link for every project. Share it with clients, publishers, or on your website.

stats.title: Preserving Human Creativity
stats.description: Join the movement of artists protecting their craft against AI generation. We are setting the standard for authenticity.

items.title: Peace of mind
items.description: Finally, a way to prove my beats are actually mine. The certificate looks professional and the blockchain proof is undeniable.

items.title: Essential for labels
items.description: As a small label, verifying demos is a nightmare. Humartz gives us a standard to trust the artists we sign.

items.title: Future proof
items.description: With AI music flooding Spotify, having a Humartz seal distinguishes my catalog as premium, human art.

items.title: Easy process
items.description: I just uploaded my stems, and 24 hours later I had my certificate anchored on Arbitrum. Super smooth.

faq.title: Verification Protocol FAQ
faq.description: Understand how we protect your music and why our hybrid manual-blockchain approach is the gold standard.

items.question: How do you verify the music?
items.answer: We use a 'Human-in-the-Loop' approach. You upload project stems or session files. Our audio engineers review them for signs of generative AI. Once approved, the data is hashed.

items.question: What is the Arbitrum Anchor?
items.answer: We take a digital fingerprint (Keccak256 merkle root hash) of your certificate and write it to the Arbitrum blockchain. This proves that your certificate existed at a specific time and hasn't been altered.

items.question: Are my files safe?
items.answer: Yes. We use enterprise-grade encrypted storage. We NEVER publish your raw stems or project files. Only the cryptographic hash is made public.

items.question: How long does verification take?
items.answer: Since we use manual review to ensure 100% accuracy, verification typically takes 24-48 hours.

items.question: Is this an NFT?
items.answer: No. You are not minting a token to trade. You are receiving a permanent, blockchain-backed certificate of authenticity for your records and reputation.

cta.title: Secure Your Discography Today
cta.description: Don't let AI dilute the value of hard work. Get your creative projects verified and give your audience the proof it deserves.

meta.title: Humartz White Paper | Proof of Humanity Protocol
meta.description: The technical documentation for the Humartz cryptographic verification protocol.

whitepaper.headline: The Humartz Protocol
whitepaper.subtitle: Proving human origin in the age of generative AI by establishing a decentralized, cryptographic standard.

abstract.title: 1. Abstract
abstract.p1: Humartz is an open-source certification protocol for human-created content.
abstract.p2: As generative systems make content creation effectively infinite, the economic value of creative work shifts from production to provenance. The central question is no longer how content is made, but whether its human origin can be independently verified.
abstract.p3: Humartz addresses this by providing a tamper-resistant certification process that binds verified human identity, creation telemetry, and cryptographic proofs into a publicly verifiable record. Rather than storing or distributing creative works, the protocol anchors proofs of human authorship on-chain, enabling platforms, licensors, and third parties to verify origin without accessing the underlying content.

scale.title: Scale Challenges
scale.description: Automated AI systems can generate content at a scale that overwhelms traditional discovery, attribution, and licensing mechanisms.

trust.title: Trust Gap
trust.description: Platforms and users cannot reliably identify AI-generated content, creating uncertainty about provenance.

solution.title: 2. The Solution
solution.intro: Humartz provides public cryptographic proof of your creation's provenance, by anchoring its human status to the blockchain.
solution.note: Humartz does not evaluate artistic quality or originality. The protocol certifies that a specific piece of content was created through a verifiable human-led process at a given point in time.

workflow.title: 3. The Certification Workflow
workflow.intro: To distinguish a prompted generation from a composed work, Humartz captures the telemetry of creation. The certification process verifies final files as well as the effort exerted during the creative process.

steps.title: 1. Identity Verification
steps.description: The creator provides the auditor with a proof of identity. This binds a specific wallet address to a verified human entity.

steps.title: 2. The Proof Folder
steps.p1: Unlike automated generation, human creation is iterative and time-bound.
steps.p2: Humartz evaluates session-level telemetry derived from project files to assess temporal effort and human intervention.
steps.p3: Signals may include creation timestamps, edit history and track modifications.
steps.p4: If metadata checks are inconclusive, or if session files cannot be shared due to technical or contractual constraints, a remote video verification may be scheduled to confirm the authenticity of the session without transferring files.

steps.title: 3. Hashing & Blockchain Commitment
steps.p1: The Proof Folder is hashed locally as a single unit. This hash acts as a cryptographic fingerprint of the entire certification process.
steps.p2: The resulting hash is submitted to the blockchain, which records the certification event in a time-stamped tamper-resistant log.
steps.p3: Humartz does not store creative content, session files, or raw telemetry. Only derived metadata and cryptographic commitments are retained.

economic.title: 4. Economic Model
economic.p1: Humartz operates as a certification protocol. Fees are assessed per certification, reflecting the computational, verification, and anchoring costs associated with establishing human provenance.
economic.p2: No recurring royalties, ownership claims, or content custody obligations are imposed by the protocol.

join.title: Join the Protocol
join.description: At Humartz, we provide the cryptographic infrastructure to value and protect human intent in a digital-first world.
